## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.FIELD\_DROPDOWN\_NO\_BORDER\_RECT\_SHADOW property

Whether or not a dropdown field should add a border rect when in a shadow block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
FIELD_DROPDOWN_NO_BORDER_RECT_SHADOW: boolean;
```
